results.title: Disuse-induced muscle fibrosis, cellular senescence, and senescence-associated secretory phenotype in older adults are alleviated during re-ambulation with metformin pre-treatment
results.text_hl: We found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated individuals had less @<m>DISEASE_Spinal_Muscular_Atrophies_of_Childhood</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014897 @@@type-I myofiber atrophy@@@ during disuse, reduced pro-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ transcriptional profiles, and lower muscle collagen deposition during recovery.

Disuse-induced muscle fibrosis, cellular senescence, and senescence-associated secretory phenotype in older adults are alleviated during re-ambulation with metformin pre-treatment Aging Cell. 2023 Jul 24;():e13936.
